description: Is a multidisciplinary group passionate about space exploration, science, and sustainable technology. We combine data analysis, creative design, and software development

members.name: Kevin Ranier Urrea Hernandez
members.bio: Front-End Web Developer and Software Programming Technician, currently studying Systems Engineering. Contributes to the team with experience in web design and development.

members.name: Keitlyn Vanessa Peralta Romero
members.bio: Industrial Engineering student with experience in project management and administration. Contributes to the team with strong leadership, organizational skills, and a focus on process optimization.

members.name: Esteban Alejandro Padilla Padilla
members.bio: Web Developer specialized in Next.js, NestJS, and TypeScript, currently studying Systems Engineering. Brings strong backend development skills and an analytical approach to solving technical challenges, contributing to robust, scalable, and efficient web solutions.

members.name: Einner Adrian Ariña Muñoz
members.bio: Systems Engineering student with a versatile skill set, supporting the team across multiple areas. Contributes through effective information research and the automation of data mining processes, helping streamline workflows.

members.name: Cristian Camilo Padilla Padilla
members.bio: High school student focused on information analysis, research, and writing. Supports the team by organizing data and creating clear, well-structured reports to aid in project understanding and decision-making.

members.name: Jose David Rodriguez Contreras
members.bio: Student programmer with experience in developing modern and scalable web applications. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React, Vite, and Node.js, contributing to the team’s front-end and back-end development efforts.
